typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "val to encode out of bound"

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "val to encode out of bound"

documentation.text:
@dev PlayerId and TeamId both serialize a total of 43 bits:
     timeZone        = 5 bits
     countryIdxInTZ  = 10 bits
     val             = 28 bits (either  (playerIdxInCountry or teamIdxInCountry)*

devdoc.author: Freeverse.io, www.freeverse.io
devdoc.details: The structure of the Assets Universe is: there are 24 timezones (TZs)... TZs range from 1,..24 (tz = 0 is Null)Each TZ has countries labeled by countryIdxInTZ = 0,.. 2**10-1Each country has teams or players, each labeled from 0,...2**28-1

encodeTZCountryAndVal(uint8,uint256,uint.details: PlayerId and TeamId both serialize a total of 43 bits:     timeZone        = 5 bits     countryIdxInTZ  = 10 bits     val             = 28 bits (either  (playerIdxInCountry or teamIdxInCountry)*

devdoc.title: Library of pure functions to serialize/deserialize IDs: playerId, countryID, etc
